localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Bitcoin is about to see a "massive transformation" and become mainstream, Citi analysts say.

Investors, do you agree? https://t.co/1IUWkSgUqJ
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
花旗分析师表示，比特币即将迎来 "大规模转型"，成为主流。

投资者，你同意吗？https://t.co/1IUWkSgUqJ

花旗分析師表示，比特幣即將迎來 "大規模轉型"，成爲主流。

投資者，你同意嗎？https://t.co/1IUWkSgUqJ

previous.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
previous.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center

localize.description: Kbee为你，你的团队，或你的客户将Google Drive文件夹转化为一个可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 将Google Drive变成wiki或帮助中心。

localize.description: Kbee爲你，你的團隊，或你的客戶將Google Drive文件夾轉化爲一個可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 將Google Drive變成wiki或幫助中心。

next.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
next.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來
